title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic tale of love, wealth, and the American Dream set in the Jazz Age.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A gripping tale of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian state and the erosion of individual freedom.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A witty romance about love and social class in Regency England.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A teenage boy's journey through New York City after being expelled from school.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An adventure story about a hobbit on a quest to reclaim treasure from a dragon.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A sweeping history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern era.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then never speaks again.
